title: Steven Levy: "Facebook: The Inside Story"
description: Michael's conversation with WIRED Editor Steven Levy. This conversation about his book "Facebook: The Inside Story" was recorded in front of an audience at the Philadelphia Free Library on 26 February, 2020. The book was published on 25 February, 2020.
author: podcasts@siriusxm.com (Michael Smerconish, Steven Levy)
